### Tender Announcement: Public Flood Risk Communications Content and Strategies

**Official Title (English):** Recommendations on public flood risk communications content and strategies in support of the development of a Canada-wide Flood Risk Awareness Portal

**Official Title (French):** Recommandations sur le contenu et les stratégies de communication publique sur les risques d’inondation pour soutenir l’élaboration d’un portail pancanadien de sensibilisation aux risques d’inondation

### Solicitation Details

*   **Reference Number:** PW-23-01023413
*   **Solicitation Number:** 202304160
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-02-23T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None (already started)
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None (review period only)
*   **Tender Status:** Expired

### Supplier Eligibility

*   Suppliers must be currently holding a valid Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement under the series E60ZT-18TSPS.
*   Suppliers that are not invited to bid may request an invitation from the Contracting Authority up to five business days before the assigned closing date.

### Contract Description

Public Safety Canada requires recommendations on public flood risk communications content and strategies. The work is to be performed from the date of contract award to 15 July 2023, inclusively. The successful contractor will have the option to extend the contract for up to two additional two (2) year periods under the same conditions.

### Security Requirements

No security requirements are applicable to this contract

The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Suppliers who wish to become Qualified TSPS SA holders may contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA to learn more.
